This is such an eye opening documentary :) I found some more interesting info here 
http://www.rethinkingaids.com/

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5511096/Deconstructing_the_Myth_of_AIDS_-_Gary_Null

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5510934/Healing_AIDS_with_Microcurrents_and_Nanosilver
Spread this knowledge people !!

Smallpox with a global effort was eradicated after many many years, it's a relatively simpler pathogen, which didn't evolve as rapidly as HIV/AIDS. Also, smallpox infected humans, where as HIV/AIDS has monkeh strains, so if you did eradicate the human strain, there's still a risk of it jumping species.

There may be a vaccine in the future as anti-viral drugs against a rapidly evolving virus isn't very effective and you'll just make it stronger this way.

A great book people would be interested in would be the book,
Basic Training For Revolutionaries. It was once in hard copy format and then it was banned. You can read more about it here.
